name: touitomamout
description: Touitomamout is a self-hosted personal assistant and reminder dashboard, providing widgets for notes, tasks, and quick links in a friendly, customizable web UI.
features: Widget dashboard: Organize information with customizable widgets for different types of content.
Quick notes: Jot down notes and ideas quickly with a simple note-taking widget.
Task reminders: Set reminders for tasks and to-dos to stay on top of your responsibilities.
Quick links: Store frequently accessed links and bookmarks for fast access from your dashboard.
Customizable layout: Arrange widgets and customize the dashboard layout to match your workflow.
Personal assistant: Keep track of daily information and tasks in one convenient location.
Friendly interface: Navigate a welcoming, easy-to-use interface designed for daily use.
Mobile responsive: Access your dashboard from any device with a responsive design.
Privacy-focused: Keep all personal data on your own server without external dependencies.
Quick access: Open your dashboard as a homepage or new tab for instant access to your information.
Lightweight: Run with minimal resources suitable for always-on personal use.
Simple setup: Get started quickly with minimal configuration and an intuitive interface.
